event.title: 1991 pre-independence border is the de jure international border, but much of it is hotly disputed

data.event: Kyrgyzstan's 1991 pre-independence border is the de jure international border, but much of it is hotly disputed with its neighbors.

event.title: August 1999, the area around Barak was occupied

data.event: In August 1999, the area around Barak was occupied by Uzbekistan, cutting it off from Kyrgyz territory.
